title: theBalancedBriefNLtech
description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

items.title: 6 Best Beard Trimmers (2026): Full Beards, Hair, Stubble
items.description: WIRED has been testing beard trimmers for six years. Our favorite is compact, reliable, ridiculously adjustable, and offers a five-year warranty.

items.title: The Best Soundbars We’ve Tested: Sonos, Sony, Bose, and More
items.description: Every television deserves a row of speakers to call its own. These are our favorite soundbars from Samsung, Yamaha, Bose, and more.

items.title: How Sequoia-backed Ethos reached the public market while rivals fell short
items.description: The profitable life-insurance platform was one of the first major tech companies to test the 2026 public markets.

items.title: Samsung S90F QD-OLED TV Review: Refined From Any Angle
items.description: With impeccable accuracy and poise, Samsung’s midrange OLED dazzles on the little things.

items.title: Last 24 hours to grab your +1 pass at 50% off to TechCrunch Disrupt 2026
items.description: Today is the last day to lock in a +1 pass at 50% off to TechCrunch Disrupt 2026, happening on October 13-15 in San Francisco. Register here.

items.title: 'Infinite Jest' Is Back. Maybe Litbros Should Be, Too
items.description: The notoriously challenging book is being re-released for its 30th anniversary. Its fandom is annoying, sure—but at least they read.

items.title: Keychron Q16 HE 8K Review: A Ceramic Disappointment
items.description: Great keyboard technology inside a disappointing, conceptually flawed ceramic shell.

items.title: Guys, I don’t think Tim Cook knows how to monetize AI
items.description: One intrepid Morgan Stanley analyst dared to ask how Apple will make money on its AI investments. The answer will not shock you.

items.title: The iPhone just had its best quarter ever
items.description: Growth in regions like China and India are credited with pushing Apple's phone sales higher than ever.

items.title: Elon Musk’s SpaceX, Tesla, and xAI in talks to merge, according to reports
items.description: This merger would bring the Grok chatbot, Starlink satellites, and SpaceX rockets together under one corporation.
